meanings.definition: To have cooked or prepared food as a chef.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I chefed a delicious pasta dish for dinner.
meanings.sent2: She chefed up a storm in the kitchen for the family gathering.
meanings.sent3: The cat chefed up a plan to steal the fish from the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity chefed a masterpiece on the plate.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the chefed meal filled the entire house.

meanings.definition: The action of being in charge of a kitchen as a chef.
meanings.sent1: His chefed leadership in the kitchen inspired the entire culinary team.
meanings.sent2: The chefed responsibilities included menu planning and staff management.
meanings.sent3: The chefed chef had to juggle multiple tasks during the busy dinner service.
